name: VIDI - Gain Jam release
description:
A short, rough beat 'em up where you fight five waves of enemies and try and earn as much as you can!  Spend money on upgrade, or save it all for a high score.

This game contains weight gain, stylized violence, and harsh language.

Gamepad recommended!

Otherwise use WASD or the arrow keys to navigate the menu, Enter to select.

Controls
Left click/A - Attack
Hold Right click/X - Charge Tear
Space/B - Summon
Middle click/RB - Toggle Lock On

Made for the 2022 Gain Jam - "Greed"

Using all Wildcards - Minions, Progress through Failure, and New Game Plus

Liabers - Player character ("Sunshine") model and animations

Yeggs - Visual designer

INAFQUEEN - Music and audio Production

Coffeecakedemon - Voice Of "Sunshine"

Axxis as the Mooks

A friend as Doctor Lemon

Another friend as Warning Voice Over

Sound from Krotos Sound Library

UnityChanToonShaderVer2 by Unity3D JP

IceDev - Everything Else
